General.Name: Waverley Capital Acquisition Corp 1
General.Description: Waverley Capital Acquisition Corp. 1 does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus on media and entertainment industries. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
